statements: DELETE FROM patient_data WHERE age > 50 AND gender = 'Male';
DELETE FROM patient_data WHERE patient_id = 1 AND gender = 'Male';
DELETE FROM patient_data WHERE age > 30 AND diagnosis LIKE '%cancer%';
DELETE FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female' AND age > 40;
DELETE FROM vital_signs WHERE patient_id IN (SELECT patient_id FROM patients WHERE age < 30);
DELETE FROM patients WHERE age < 30 AND gender = 'Male';
DELETE FROM Patients WHERE patient_age > 50 AND patient_diagnosis = 'Cancer';
DELETE FROM Treatments WHERE treatment_name = 'Physical Therapy';
